description: Updates the name of a current Direct Connect gateway.

parameters.name: directConnectGatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the Direct Connect gateway to update.

parameters.name: newDirectConnectGatewayName
parameters.description: The new name for the Direct Connect gateway.

nested_items.name: directConnectGateway
nested_items.description: Informaiton about a Direct Connect gateway, which enables you to connect virtual interfaces and virtual private gateways or transit gateways.

nested_items.name: directConnectGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Direct Connect gateway.

nested_items.name: directConnectGatewayName
nested_items.description: The name of the Direct Connect gateway.

nested_items.name: amazonSideAsn
nested_items.description: The autonomous system number (ASN) for the Amazon side of the connection.

nested_items.name: ownerAccount
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the Direct Connect gateway.

nested_items.name: directConnectGatewayState
nested_items.description: The state of the Direct Connect gateway. The following are the possible values:
pending: The initial state after calling  CreateDirectConnectGateway.
available: The Direct Connect gateway is ready for use.
deleting: The initial state after calling  DeleteDirectConnectGateway.
deleted: The Direct Connect gateway is deleted and cannot pass traffic.

nested_items.name: stateChangeError
nested_items.description: The error message if the state of an object failed to advance.
